com.singularity.ee.agent.systemagent.api
Interface ITask

All Known Subinterfaces:
ISelfManagedTask
All Known Implementing Classes:
AForkedJavaTask, AJavaTask, AManagedMonitor
public interface ITask

this will represent either a java task or an exec task. TODO: dont do a rush job of documenting this file, do this along with documenting the steps to create and install ur own task on the system agent.

Method Detail

execute

TaskOutput execute(Map<String,String> taskArguments,
                   TaskExecutionContext taskContext)
                   throws TaskExecutionException
execute() is the method to do processing. Execution should check on the isStopped() to stop further execution

Parameters:
taskArguments - the name value pairs sent to the task for execution
taskContext - the task execution context
Returns:
the task output
Throws:
TaskExecutionException - if the task could not be executed

stop

void stop()
implementations of the stop API should stop immediately.
